official_title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to establish a separate judicial district for the counties of Nassau and Suffolk, New York.

summary.text: Establishes a separate judicial district (the Southeastern District) for the counties of Nassau and Suffolk, New York.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28, United States Code, to establish a separate judicial district for the counties of Nassau and Suffolk, New York.
